subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kaye Cowher, the wife of the former Pittsburgh Steelers coach Bill Cowher, played alongside her twin sister, Faye, in college and in the Women’s Professional Basketball League.
snippet: Kaye Cowher, the wife of the former Pittsburgh Steelers coach Bill Cowher, played alongside her twin sister, Faye, in college and in the Women’s Professional Basketball League.
